Context: George Brown College offers 172 full-time programs and 180 continuing education certificates/designations. More than 31,000 full-time students and 64,500 continuing education registrations annually attend the college. Programs are available in a wide variety of professions including Robotics Technician, Automation and PLC fields, and PLC programming. Students can earn certificates, diplomas, graduate certificates, apprenticeships, and degrees. George Brown College has a support team that offers assistance and the college's toll-free number is 1-888-553-5333. The support center hours are Monday to Friday, 9am - 10pm (EST) and Sat. & Sun. from 9am - 5pm (EST). Notable students have expanded their knowledge in their respective fields and secured new positions after completing programs such as the Robotics Technician program and the PLC program.
